mapper.insert: insert into waiting (waitingNumber, waitingCustomerNumber, waitingPhone, waitingPeople, waitingDate, waitingAvailable, memberNumber) values (#{waitingNumber}, #{waitingCustomerNumber}, #{waitingPhone}, #{waitingPeople}, #{waitingDate}, #{waitingAvailable}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select * from waiting where waitingAvailable = #{waitingAvailable} and memberNumber = #{memberNumber}
select * from waiting, member where waiting.memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and member.memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and waitingDate like #{waitingDate}
mapper.update: update waiting set waitingAvailable = #{waitingAvailable} where waitingNumber = #{waitingNumber} and memberNumber = #{memberNumber}
mapper.select: select max(waitingCustomerNumber) from waiting where memberNumber = #{memberNumber};
select * from waiting where memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and waitingCustomerNumber = #{waitingCustomerNumber};
select count(*) from waiting where memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and (waitingAvailable like "대기" or waitingAvailable like "입장 가능");
select * from waiting where memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and (waitingAvailable like "대기" or waitingAvailable like "입장 가능");
